body: Sorry I do not have the time to run your file.  If you are controlling the east shade and south shade separately, they should be in different shading groups.  For the following image, i have two shading groups with three states (open, half down and full down).  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/oS9GPNprEigTtMZ8Og0vH7asNwa07Vjo3AXAgOLsgKRNb01uSPW7DjUckT5zm2ainhWTxZnDfQXgMe5IP*lKIF-3I0vfHLYF/12.JPG) At the same time, i found your max and min illuminance is a bit odd. More details can be found here: [LINK](http://daysim.ning.com/page/daysim-shading-control-modes). From your GH file, I cant see how you are trying to view your files but if you have those .ill files, you should be able to see the files.
